original_title: God's Greatest Hits: The Music of Christmas
overview: Nothing unites people more at Christmas time than music, particularly the songs that celebrate the season. God's Greatest Hits: The Music of Christmas features performances of a wide range of songs. The musicians - the Bills, the Nathaniel Dett Chorale, Ali Matthews, and Jacob Moon, among others - perform and recall their favorite songs and memories in this collection of Christmas carols.
title: God's Greatest Hits: The Music of Christmas
